alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 02 at 7:52PM CDT until April 03 at 9:07AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Black River at Black River Falls affecting Jackson County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Black River at Black River Falls. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 47.0 feet, Some rural roads may begin to flood including county Highway VV downstream near the La Crosse County line. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 47.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:00 PM CDT Sunday was 50.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this evening and continue falling to 39.9 feet next Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 47.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 47.0 feet on 03/30/2004. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse. The next statement will be issued Monday morning at 915 AM CDT.
